## Equations baby

$$
\begin{aligned}
\text{Total state revenue}
  &= \text{Demand} \cdot \text{MCR} \cdot (P - C) \\
\text{Demand}
  &= U \cdot F \cdot I \\
\text{where}\quad
U&=\text{number of users},\quad
F=\text{frequency of use},\quad
I=\text{intensity of use},\\
\text{MCR}&=\text{market capture rate},\quad
P=\text{price},\quad
C=\text{costs}.
\end{aligned}
$$ {#eq-revenue}
